name: Mobile Crisis Team
description: CBHS has a Mobile Crisis Team that provides emergency evaluation and treatment to adults (aged 18 years and older) who are experiencing mental health crises in San Francisco. - For individuals with Medi-Cal benefits: Services are either free or cost a small fee. - For others without Medi-Cal: Service fee is based on a sliding scale. How to Apply: - Call the Mobile Crisis Team by phone. Open Hours: - Monday to Friday: 11AM to 11PM - Saturdays, Sundays and holidays: 12PM to 8PM Service Contact Inf
